pages.title: Legendary Swords
pages.text: Similar to the other server there is legendary loot that you can find.$(br2)Legendary weapons have been HEAVILY buffed but also harder to find, so if you find one you better take care of it.

pages.title: Other loot types
pages.text: There are many other types of loot such as relics and artifacts, to learn more about these refer to the Relics and Artifacts entry.$(br2)There are also many other weapons and tools that cannot be crafted but can only be found in chests.
